TopicTitle: One of my favorite Youtubers is FINALLY RETURNING after so long without making vids!

Articles.Content:
https://twitter.com/renthedog/status/523917924256743425

His 90,000 subs (including me) have been waiting. Five months. 150 days. We've been waiting since APRIL 29th! And it is coming. Soon. Soon. Less than one week. We have been waiting. His name is Rendog. And he... is returning. He was the FIRST youtuber I ever watched!

Now, what is all this hype about? What series?

Well, I'll answer the first question with a question: Why are you asking what the hype is about? It's obvious!

Now, to answer the second question: It's a Minecraft Let's Play. I know what you're thinking, but hear me out, alright? First, this was the first minecraft lets play I ever watched! I've been watching it since Season 1, Episode 51. The upcoming video is.... Season 4, episode 1. I am a dedicated viewer. But, over these 5 months, I have forgotten him. Due to a video drought. He uploaded a season 4 teaser about 2 months ago, but that was it for a while, enough to bring my viewership back for a few days. But then it left again. Until about a week ago, when he uploaded 4 videos, all titled, "Our Escape [Part # of 4]", and that got me hyped. I am so excited, I may lose sleep over it.

Edited October 22, 2014 by Sun

Ahh Rendog. The first video I ever watched from him was this

nearly 3 years ago. I really enjoyed his Terraria series (I used to be a BIG Terraria player... I had over 1000 hours in that game) so understandably, I was a bit sad that he discontinued it in favor of a Minecraft series. But I'm getting way off topic now, at least its good to see that he's still "in business" so to speak. Edited October 22, 2014 by Stratzenblitz75
